name: The Last King Standing
description:
Be the last king standing. Sure, you’ll die, eventually...
But, how many can you take to the ground with you ?

Roll the dice, and choose who will be your target.
The sword will damage the enemy in front of you.
The bow will do 2 damages on the target you choose.
The armor will protect you. (6 max, don’t waste)

Die in dignity for those who took this path before you.

Developed in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022.
All assets & musics have been created by us, for this Jam.
The theme was: Roll of the dice.
